```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(plm)
library(stargazer)
data("Wages")
?Wages
summary(Wages)
M1 <- lm(lwage ~ ed, data = Wages)
M2 <- lm(lwage ~ ed + exp, data = Wages)
summary(M1)
confint(M1)

labels <- c('')
stargazer::stargazer(M1, M2, title='OLS regression of the Percentage of Wages Variation', digits=2, type='html', header = FALSE)
type='html'
```
